properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nishchalamainadi Yesu raajyamu Prakaashinche raajyamu Yuga yugamulu niluchunu Prabhuni raajyamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kristu raajya simhaasana mentho goppadi Kanakambu kanna bahu prakaashinchunu Daani chuttu devuni mahima yundunu Deeksha thoda jayinchedu vaare pondedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naashanamu lenidi Yesu raajyamu nityudagu Thandri daanistiramu jesenu prabhuni Raajyamu yentho anantamainadi Paripaalinchu thaane tharatharambulu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thana raajya mahimaku mimmu pilichenu vinayamugaa Neethi bhakhti kaligi niluvudi Kadavaraku viswaasamu kaligiyundina kristu yesu Meeku neeti makuta mitchunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yesu rakhta mandu yevaru kadugabadedaro Vaare hrudaya shuddini pondedarilalo Paraloka raajyamulo praveshinturu Pravimaluni mukhamujoochi santasinturu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bhooloka raajyamulu antarinchunu prabhu Yesu Raajyamu niluchu stiramugaa neeti samaadhana Mulatho devudelunu nede cheravaa neevu Aa raajyamulo{/lang-eng}
